Texts.Eng: Welcome to your new mech! Take a moment to move around and get used to it. You can ^#FF1493;duck by pressing ^#FF1493;down^reset;, or ^#FF1493;sprint with a ^#FF1493;double-tap!^reset;
Mechs have powerful leg servos that allow you to jump pretty well. Try leaping up to reach the next floor.
To reach the exit here, you'll have to take the left side. Your mech can crouch through the gap on the top.
Zero gravity combat is a bit trickier than on flat ground. Accuracy is important, so you'll need to learn to lead your targets properly.

WARNING: Your vehicle is not certified 
for this ^#FF1493;weird^reset; environment!
Disregarding this warning may cause pilot death and/or invalidation of vehicle warranty.

DANGER! This fluid is rapidly shorting out every system on board the mech. We should leave this liquid soon or risk death.
Curious. This liquid appears to be restoring your mechs energy, rather than causing negative effects.
DANGER! Your mech's temperature control systems are failing! Evacuate immediately!
DANGER! This poisonous water seems to seep into your mechs components and cause serious issues. You should get out sooner than later.
DANGER! Your mechs servos and components are rapidly freezing within the liquid nitrogen. That isn't a good thing. Evacuate soon or you will know regret.
DANGER! Sulphuric acid has compromised your mech plating. I suggest leaving the liquid immediately.
DANGER! The Elder Fluid is rapidly turning your mech into pudding! Get out swiftly!
